attacks.name: Jet Punch
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Elegant Sole
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon’s Elegant Sole attack’s base damage is 60.

attacks.name: Beast Game GX
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, take 1 more Prize card. If this Pokémon has at least 7 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack’s cost), take 3 more Prize cards instead. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
